project.description: PHP Without mcrypt and intl extensions (CLI and CGI SAPI and HTTP)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
# Install dependencies export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH echo $PATH sudo yum install -y autoconf automake bison flex bzip2-devel curl-devel \ freetype-devel gcc gcc-c++ gdbm-devel git gmp-devel libdbi libjpeg-turbo-devel \ libpng-devel libtool libxml2-devel libXpm-devel libxslt-devel make mysql-devel net-snmp-devel \ openldap-devel openssl-devel pcre-devel pkgconfig postgresql-devel readline-devel unixODBC-devel vim wget # Get the source code cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/php/php-src.git cd php-src git checkout tags/php-7.1.2
# Symlink LDAP libraries and GMP header sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/libldap.so /usr/lib/libldap.so sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/liblber.so /usr/lib/liblber.so sudo ln -sf /usr/include/gmp-s390x.h /usr/include/gmp.h
#Build PHP
#a. Without mcrypt and intl extensions: #CLI and CGI SAPIs HTTP sudo yum install -y httpd httpd-devel
#Build with apxs2 cd $WORK_DIR/php-src ./buildconf --force ./configure --datadir=/usr/local/share/php --localstatedir=/var --mandir=/usr/local/share/man --prefix=/usr/local --sysconfdir=/usr/local/etc --enable-bcmath --enable-calendar --enable-ctype --with-curl --enable-dba=shared --enable-exif --enable-filter --enable-flatfile --enable-fpm --enable-ftp --enable-gd-native-ttf --enable-inifile --enable-mbstring --enable-mysqlnd --enable-opcache --enable-pcntl --enable-shmop --enable-simplexml --enable-sockets --enable-sysvsem --enable-sysvshm --enable-sysvmsg --enable-xmlreader --enable-xmlwriter --enable-zend-signals --enable-zip --disable-phpdbg --disable-phpdbg-webhelper --with-apxs2 --with-bz2 --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/etc --with-config-file-scan-dir=/usr/local/etc/conf.d --with-fpm-group=apache --with-fpm-user=apache --with-freetype-dir --with-gd --with-gdbm --with-gettext --with-gmp --with-iconv --with-jpeg-dir --with-kerberos --with-ldap --with-ldap-sasl --with-mysql-sock=/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock --with-mysqli=mysqlnd --with-openssl --with-pcre-regex --with-pdo-mysql=mysqlnd --with-pdo-odbc=unixODBC,/usr --with-pdo-pgsql --with-pdo-sqlite --with-pgsql --with-png-dir --with-readline --with-snmp --with-sqlite3 --with-unixODBC=/usr --with-xpm-dir=/usr --with-xsl --with-zlib --without-pcre-jit make clean make -j$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l)
make test #(**NOTE:There are few test case failures which are also observed on Intel x86 platform. These failures can be ignored.)
sudo make install sudo install -m644 php.ini-production /usr/local/etc/php.ini sudo sed -i 's@php/includes"@&\ninclude_path = ".:/usr/local/lib/php"@' /usr/local/etc/php.ini php -v
#Configure PHP # PHP-FPM #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default to set php-fpm pid sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default.orig sudo sed -i '17d' /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default sudo sed -i "17i pid = run/php-fpm.pid" /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default
sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
cp $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in.orig sudo sed -i '13d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "13i prefix=/usr/local" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in
sudo sed -i '14d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "14i exec_prefix=/usr/local" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '16d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "16i php_fpm_BIN=/usr/local/sbin/php-fpm" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '17d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "17i php_fpm_CONF=/usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i '18d' $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in sudo sed -i "18i php_fpm_PID=/var/run/php-fpm.pid" $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in
sudo cp $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm.in /etc/init.d/php-fpm sudo chmod 755 /etc/init.d/php-fpm
sudo chkconfig --levels 235 php-fpm on sudo /etc/init.d/php-fpm start
#Zend OPcache #Modify the file /usr/local/etc/php.ini to enable Zend OPcache: sudo cp /usr/local/etc/php.ini /usr/local/etc/php.ini.orig sudo sed -i "1784i zend_extension=opcache.so" /usr/local/etc/php.ini
php -v
if php -v | grep "Zend OPcache v7.1.2"; then echo "Done"
else exit 1 fi cd $WORK_DIR sudo chmod 766 /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf cd /etc/httpd/conf
sudo echo -e "<FilesMatch \.php$>" >> httpd.conf sudo echo -e "SetHandler application/x-httpd-php" >> httpd.conf sudo echo -e "</FilesMatch>" >> httpd.conf
sudo service httpd restart sleep 2m
cd /var/www/html sudo touch testphp.php
sudo chmod 766 testphp.php sudo echo -e "<?php" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "phpinfo();" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "?>" >> testphp.php
cat -n testphp.php
sudo httpd -k restart curl http://127.0.0.1:80/testphp.php
